translations: （女子外表、举止、穿着）男性化的，男人腔的；（男子）高大的
充当男性角色的女同性恋者；粗鲁的男人或男孩

sentences.sentence: She didn't get any extra food: you're expected to butch these things out.
sentences.translation: 她没有吃任何其他食物：您得靠自己理齐这些事儿。

sentences.sentence: The upstairs bar was full of butch gays in cowboy outfits, drinking beer out of the bottle.
sentences.translation: 楼上的酒吧里满是身穿牛仔装的“壮男”，拿着酒瓶子喝啤酒。

sentences.sentence: He didn't necessarily want to be the in-control butch man; he wanted to find another way of being.
sentences.translation: 他没必要摆出一副掌握一切的屠夫面孔；他要找到另一种存在的方式。
